short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A handy toolbox for Shopify development

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension provides Shopify developers and store owners with quick-access tools to streamline theme management and page navigation. Hereâ€™s what you can do:

- Instantly view the current theme's name and ID.

- Toggle the preview bar on previewed themes; the page will refresh automatically when toggled.

- Generate a preview link with an option to include the preview bar, copied directly to your clipboard.

- From any storefront product, collection, or page view, jump directly to the corresponding admin page for faster edits.

- On product, collection, page, blog, or article pages, quickly access the relevant template in the theme editor for seamless customization.

- Access a settings tab to control options, like toggling previews of "myshopify.com" URLs on the partners dashboard.

- Stay tuned for additional customization options based on user feedback. Perfect for Shopify developers looking to boost productivity!
